Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: Marketing Strategy to Grow your Business
headline: This free online course will take your business to a new level by explaining how to create a winning marketing strategy.
description: A solid marketing plan that propels your business to a new height is the key to the success of your business. This free online course on business marketing strategy will teach you how to build one to increase your revenues. You will learn how to create a strategic marketing plan for your business and integrate various marketing programs to promote your industry and drive customers to your products.
courseDescription:
Would you like to produce ultimate marketing objectives that will simplify your business strategies to develop and achieve your overall business goals? This course explores the difference between strong and weak objectives, types of marketing objectives and workshops that will prepare you to create marketing plans for your business. Discover the eleven marketing programs designed to attract customers and educate them about your product or service. These fuel customer acquisitions and include email marketing, SEO, content marketing and advertising, with examples of how you can deploy the right programs to create demand for your products or services. You will also learn how to measure the effectiveness of each of your marketing programs independently to achieve specific individual results. Next, you will learn how to figure out which programs work to generate sales and which don’t and how to target each program based on your target market.

Next, the course will teach you how to connect your entire marketing program through ‘thought leadership’. You will learn its benefits, including tips on how to stand out as a leader. You will explore the various thought leadership programs and how to choose the one best for your business. Via workshops, we demonstrate how to create your thought leadership strategy. In addition, we teach you a strategic marketing plan, such as how to generate leads, drive traffic to your website and establish your brand as a leader in the marketplace. Then you will learn to create and evaluate your marketing mix, which brings all your marketing programs into a cohesive marketing strategy. You can determine how much time and resources to put into each marketing program. The course will also teach you how to avoid common marketing mistakes usually made by most entrepreneurs in creating a marketing strategy for their businesses.

The course contains tactics, tips and practical examples of workable marketing programs for businesses that have deployed these programs for their business growth. You cannot go wrong! By taking this course, you will have a more robust understanding of how best to create marketing programs and plans that will set you remarkably apart from your competition. Start this course today and leave your competitors on the back foot, desperate to learn your secrets.

Start Course Now

•  Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Define marketing objectives.
    • Describe how to align your marketing objectives with your business strategies.
    • Recognize the guidelines for creating marketing objectives.
    • List the types of marketing objectives.
    • Explain the various marketing programs that you can implement in your business.
    • Distinguish content marketing from retention marketing.

  • Lesson Summary

    • Customer acquisition is crucial to your business because, without customers, you don't really have a business.
    • Customer acquisition equals marketing plus sales.
    • Marketing objectives provide a guide to your entire marketing strategy.
    • When your marketing strategy is in sync with all your other business strategies, your business will be much more effective.
    • Your website is the window to your business. It communicates what your business does, your products and services, and most importantly how to buy from you.  
    • Search Engine Optimization (SEO)  will get your business listed and ranked as high as possible in Google and other search engines.  
    • Advertising online is one of the so many options available today to get exposure for your products or services.
    • Press relations can be a very powerful and effective tool in your marketing toolkit.  
    • Social media is a key component for nearly every business.
    • Email is one of the most powerful and cost-effective tools you can use to build your business. 
    • Content marketing is one of the newest and most effective ways to attract new customers.
    • Trade shows and events can be a wildly successful vehicle to gain access to new customers.

  •  Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Explain thought leadership.
    • Describe how you can stand out as a leader.
    • Identify the importance of thought leadership.
    • Recognize the different thought leadership programs.
    • Explain how to implement the different thought leadership programs into your overall marketing strategy. 
    • Evaluate your marketing mix to create balanced marketing programs.
    • Recognize common marketing mistakes and how to avoid them.

  • Lesson Summary

    • Thought leadership is the glue that holds your entire marketing program together.
    • Thought leadership is the cornerstone of an effective marketing strategy.
    • Thought leadership helps close more deals.
    • A robust thought leadership strategy provides you and your business with tremendous credibility.
    • Thought leadership can lead to charging more for your products and services.  
    • One of the ways keys to having a successful thought leadership program is to have a clear and defined strategy for executing your thought leadership program.
    • Thought leadership programs include webinar, magazine articles, conference speeches, blog posts, online course etc.
    • Implementing thought leadership will set your business apart from your competition.
    • Creating a solid action plan requires that you evaluate your marketing mix to make certain you have the right balance of activity going to the right programs.
    • Marketing mix combines different marketing programs and creates a cohesive overall marketing strategy.
    • Every great marketing plan breaks down each marketing activity into its objectives and tactics.
